work_experiences.description: Developing custom Java Plugins and managing a community of hundreds of thousands of players.

Internships in different Departments. Simulation of ECU Communication with Java and Spring Boot. Creation of Internal Phishing Awareness Campaign Platform with TypeScript, Neo4j, Docker, Python, Flask. Development of a Pedestrian Simulator in Kotlin for Bosch Research.
Working in the Field of Self-Driving Trucks, developing Algorithms for Radar Perception in Python and C++.
Working in the Field of Self-Driving Cars, developing CI/CD Pipelines, Python Tooling and embedded Software for Field Data Collection in C++
